I wonder if I might ask a favor, .

Nema wants me to collect marked fragments from the bodies of {@LinkCreature:18#14#piledriver golems}. The problem is they terrify me. And I can't tell Nema, because she terrifies me, too.

Would you mind collecting them for me and bringing them back here?

Oh, thank you! I really didn't want to upset Nema.

Could you maybe not tell her about this?
Oh, please hurry. Nema has already been waiting on me for quite some time.
